name: Pirate Party - BETA
description:
Go claw to claw with a friend to find out who is truly the best pirate captain. This demo features 4 minigames which may change slightly depending on which part of the map the leading player is currently in.

The game takes a different approach to controls by allowing two people to play on the same keyboard, meaning you can play without the need for any controllers or extra wires! 

Controls:

  • W/Up arrow - Jump
  • A & D/Left & Right Arrow - Movement
  • Escape - Pause
  • (During button mashing games) A/Right Arrow
